title: What are the main disadvantages of an underdeveloped country? - Quora

response.answer_text: Each country will have individual characteristics, so generalizing is only so useful (as in not very). That said, an established rule or law in regards to enforcing the legal code impartially, tends to be absent or intermittent: bribery is common in many developing nations. Infrastructure is often either undeveloped or poorly maintained: pot holed roads, broken equipment or missing at harbors, airports, and government buildings are not uncommon.
